trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Antioch
There were no other sightings in Antioch on or around October 5th 2006
divs: sighting detailsi was heading home from work and had gone thru downtown antioch, il heading west on route 173 (near the il\wi border) at approx. 6:30 p.m. central time. i saw what at first appeared to be the vapor trail of a high flying jet. the object was aspirin size at arms length. at first i didn't pay that much attention because i thought it was the beginning of a vapor trail. the object was in clear view for several minutes. it seemed odd that it never "grew longer" as a normal vapor trail does. it also was a brighter white, appeared to be solid and teardrop shaped. as i was driving (the road begins to wind southwest\northwest and is tree lined) i noticed a second object that was exactly the same distance away as the first and again appeared as a teardrop shaped\vapor trail like object. i thought this was odd because this one was pointing northeast while the first object was pointing southwest. the second object was to the right of the other object and appeared out of nowhere. they appeared to be flying at the same altitude. as i continued westbound a few minutes later,(now 3 visible what appeared to be yet another identical shaped\sized object also pointing southwest) i noticed yet a third object, again the same size as the first two which appeared to be further west than the first object but not as far south. the third object put the 3 objects in an offset triangle formation. i was trying to go faster to get home to get my digital camera\camcorder, but the drivers in front of me were moving slowly in a no passing zone. i have no idea if anyone else saw these objects, but there were a few cars in front of me and a few behind me. the sky was clear with no clouds and the sun was setting in the west, yet there was still plenty of daylight. then as if the objects knew i was trying to hurry home to photograph them they dissappeared at approximately 6:37 p.m. i know that a vapor trail from a jet doesn't just disappear within a few seconds, they dissipate over time. as i finally started to move faster and at a very far distance away, i saw one of the objects again near the horizon to the west and then lost it as i turned southbound onto wilmot road from route 173. note: i did immediately draw a picture of what i saw, and can fax it in or scan it and email it later. please let me know where to send the fax or email.
Summary: 3 Teardrop shaped objects appeared/dissappeared within 7 minutes at high altitude, at first thought they were vapor trails, no clouds, daylight
